name: Tap Zoo: Arctic
description:
Can you build your own wonderland for all of the cute arctic animals?

Come explore the snow-covered tundra and create your very own Arctic Zoo! You're seconds away from building your own zoo by choosing which animals to buy and breed! Customize your zoo for the kids who come all the way North to visit your polar paradise! Have fun nurturing and collecting all the different animals! Can you find all of the cross-breeding combinations?

LOTS OF FUN FEATURES:

- Build your town and zoo on a beautiful glacier blanketed with fluffy white snow!

- Visit your friends' zoos

- Tons of new animals

- Collect money your animals have earned for you at the zoo

- Hire helpers to care for the animals

- Decorate your zoo with lots of winter-themed decorations

- Plant trees to make the zoo more beautiful

- Cross-breed and breed your animals

- Place sidewalks to guide your visitors to all the different animals

- Very fun to play!

- Unlock new animals and attractions

- Works on iPhone 3G, 3GS, 4, iPad and iPod Touch

Please note that Tap Zoo Arctic is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
